task.title: View a PowerPoint presentation
task.shortdesc: In this section, you will learn how to view a PowerPoint presentation.

taskbody.prereq:
You must have
Windows 7 or newer
Microsoft PowerPoint 2007 or newer
A PowerPoint presentation
Steps:

step.cmd: Select From beginning to view a PowerPoint presentation.

result.p: Your PowerPoint will be visualized on your screen.
